podcast.title: Students first
podcast.publish-info: Published for The Praeci Podcast on November 13, 2017.
podcast.description: Edited over 5 hours of interviews and research down to a 73 minute episode on the history of how student and academic affairs at NC State became a part of the same division.

podcast.title: Title IX in the Trump era
podcast.publish-info: Published for The Praeci Podcast on October 16, 2017.
podcast.description: In the first episode of The Praeci Podcast, I spoke to Robin Kelley, NC State’s deputy Title IX coordinator, about the history of Title IX, including contemporaneous changes made by Betsy DeVos.

podcast.title: Interview with NC State’s Dean of the College of Humanities and Social Sciences
podcast.publish-info: Published for the Dialogue with Technician podcast on September 4, 2017.
podcast.description: I interviewed Dean Jeff Braden about the College of Humanities and Social Sciences (CHASS), general education requirements, and what it’s like to be a CHASS major at a STEM university.

podcast.title: Interview with Chancellor Randy Woodson
podcast.publish-info: Published for the Dialogue with Technician podcast on August 28, 2017.
podcast.description: I interviewed Chancellor Woodson for the first interview of Technician’s news podcast, Dialogue with Technician. We talked about statements he made about the Charlottesville demonstrations, disability access at NC State, and other topics.

print.title: Student Government impeachment proceedings set for a do-over
print.description: Coverage of an ongoing story about the impeachment of NC State’s Student Body Treasurer, released about an hour after the news release from the presiding committee chair about the decision to start the impeachment proceedings over.

print.title: Activism on campus from the student perspective
print.description: I interviewed six NC State students with a reputation for activism and community involvement. The article was part of a series I wrote about activism at NC State early in my reporting for Technician.

print.title: Technician news coverage in the upcoming year
print.description: I wrote this pseudo-editorial with Technician’s then Assistant News Editor Luke Perrin to outline the goals for news coverage in the volume of Technician we would be leading.

print.title: Student Government committee drops charges in impeachment hearing
print.description: The hearing lasted from 7 PM to 11 PM and the story was published just before 1 AM because follow-up interviews and some open door law research was required before publishing.

print.title: Student Senate votes down endorsement of Transportation fee increase
print.description: This was coverage of a Student Senate hearing on fee increases.
